name: astr
description: Run TypeScript/JavaScript tests in NodeJS or Chromium

scripts.test: npm run build && node bin/run-tests.js --testdir bin/example-tests
scripts.build: npx tsc -p tsconfig.json && npx ncp src/astr-puppeteer.js bin/astr-puppeteer.js
scripts.postinstall: npm run build && npx ncp src/astr.ts ./index.ts
